descripcion_Núcleo: It is the command center. All resources are stored here, and you must protect it at all costs.
descripcion_Taladro: Mines copper, iron, and coal at no cost. Can be boosted with Water.
descripcion_Cinta Transportadora: Moves resources from one place to another.
descripcion_Enrutador: Distributes resources in a chosen direction.
descripcion_Selector: Allows only one specific resource to pass while diverting the rest.
descripcion_Overflow: Diverts resources once the line becomes saturated.
descripcion_Túnel: Sends resources underground so other structures can be built above.
descripcion_Horno: Uses fuel to smelt Bronze, Steel, and Silicon.
descripcion_Taladro Eléctrico: Improved drill that can also extract stone and sand, but consumes energy. Can be boosted with Acid.
descripcion_Cable: Connects nearby buildings to the power grid.
descripcion_Batería: Stores excess energy to be used later.
descripcion_Bomba Hidráulica: Extracts liquids from the ground using energy.
descripcion_Túnel salida: Sends resources underground so other structures can be built above.
descripcion_Cinta Magnética: Improved version of the Conveyor Belt that transports more items.
descripcion_Torre básica: Simple defense turret; can shoot Copper or Iron.
descripcion_Rifle: Long-range defense turret that fires Bronze, Steel, or Uranium.
descripcion_Lanzallamas: Uses combustible resources to burn enemies. Can be boosted with Oil.
descripcion_Planta Química: Allows selecting a recipe to produce chemical compounds.
descripcion_Láser: Fires a constant laser whose damage depends on available energy.
descripcion_Líquido Infinito: Generates any liquid of choice using magic.
descripcion_Turbina: Generates energy using a fuel and Water.
descripcion_Refinería de Metales: Refines Copper Stone or Iron Stone into Copper or Iron using Acid.
descripcion_Fábrica de Drones: Produces transport drones using Silicon, Batteries, and a large amount of energy.
descripcion_Horno de Lava: Similar to a normal furnace but uses the heat of lava to smelt faster.
descripcion_Generador Geotérmico: Generates energy by evaporating Water; must be built on lava.
descripcion_Taladro de Explosión: Uses explosives to extract one resource from every minable tile in its area.
descripcion_Muro: Distracts enemies while your defenses deal with them.
descripcion_Puerto de Carga: Connects Cargo Ports so your drones can move resources between them.
descripcion_Ensambladora: Uses Copper and Silicon to produce components.
descripcion_Planta Nuclear: Consumes 1 part Enriched Uranium and 20 parts Depleted Uranium along with large amounts of Water to generate massive energy.
descripcion_Torre de Alta Tensión: Connects power grids across long distances.
descripcion_Perforadora de Petróleo: Produces oil at high cost anywhere on the map.
descripcion_Mortero: Fires long-range explosives, devastating groups of enemies.
descripcion_Torre Reparadora: Projects a repair laser onto nearby buildings using energy.
descripcion_Onda de Choque: Charges and releases a powerful shockwave that damages and slows all enemies within its range.
descripcion_Muro Reforzado: An improved version of the wall, harder and better
descripcion_Silo de Misiles: Here you can build a nuclear missile using steel, explosives, oil, and 90% enriched uranium.
descripcion_Planta de Enriquecimiento: Allows recycling uranium by consuming large amounts of water and energy continuously
descripcion_Cobre: Basic resource, essential for early buildings. Can be refined to obtain Bronze
descripcion_Carbón: Basic fuel, useful for operating Furnaces and Generators
descripcion_Bronce: Useful resource for constructing mid-tier infrastructure
descripcion_Hierro: Basic resource, essential for early buildings
descripcion_Acero: Useful resource for constructing mid-tier infrastructure
descripcion_Arena: Resource required for producing refined goods such as Silicon or Concrete
descripcion_Piedra: Resource required for producing Concrete. Can be transformed into Sand in a Crusher
descripcion_Silicio: Resource useful for producing Solar Panels, Drones, and Circuits
descripcion_Concreto: Resource used for building mid-tier infrastructure
descripcion_Piedra Cúprica: Can be used as normal Stone or purified to obtain Copper
descripcion_Piedra Férrica: Can be used as normal Stone or purified to obtain Iron
descripcion_Piedra Sulfatada: Can be used as normal Stone, but is essential for producing more refined goods
descripcion_Compuesto Incendiario: Advanced fuel, more efficient and durable than Coal
descripcion_Explosivo: Advanced ammunition for Mortars and required for operating Blast Drills
descripcion_Batería: Resource required for producing all types of Drones
descripcion_Plástico: Lightweight material, useful for Drone production
descripcion_Componente: Basic circuit, required for producing all types of Drones and advanced electrical buildings
descripcion_Uranio Bruto: Unrefined uranium, useful as ammunition. Can be refined to separate Depleted Uranium from Enriched Uranium
descripcion_Uranio Enriquecido: Uranium-235, useful for power generation in Nuclear Plants
descripcion_Uranio Empobrecido: Uranium-238, required to support energy production in Nuclear Plants and useful as ammunition
construir_sobre_agua_lava: Must be built over water, oil, or lava
construir_sobre_minerales_piedra: Must be built over minerals, stone, or sand
procesador_to_value_of_cell: to the value in the cell
procesador_into_value_of_cell: into the value in the cell
planta_quimica_descripcion 0: Consumes Sulfated Stone and energy to produce Acid
planta_quimica_descripcion 1: Uses Sand, Stone, and Water to produce Concrete
planta_quimica_descripcion 2: Uses Coal and Sulfated Stone to produce Explosives
planta_quimica_descripcion 3: Uses Oil and energy to produce long-lasting fuel compounds
planta_quimica_descripcion 4: Extracts Sulfated Stone from Oil using energy
planta_quimica_descripcion 5: Uses Acid, Iron, and energy to produce Batteries
planta_quimica_descripcion 6: Uses Oil and a large amount of energy to produce Plastic
